message: Let's be fair, Bob. I get $60, you get $40.  Take it or leave it.
Alice, my turn.  It seems only fair to reverse your previous offer. What do you say?
Bob, that's not how this works. How about I take a little less, you get a little more? $55 for me, $45 for you.
Alice, time is running out.  I'll accept your previous split, but with us reversed.  Deal?
